Interface RuleClause

All Superinterfaces:
ModelComponent, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
ObrRuleActionClauseImpl, ObrRuleClauseImpl, ObrRuleConditionClauseImpl, RuleActionClauseEx, RuleConditionClauseEx
public interface RuleClause
extends ModelComponent

This interface represents a single IF/DO clause inside a rule

getLocalErrors

java.util.Collection<RuleError> getLocalErrors()
Returns errors at the clause level (e.g. empty IF clause) but not those of it's children.

Returns:
collection of errors, can be empty but never null
